roleset.name: (cause to) become wood or like wood
roleset.note: LIGNIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lignify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4. (from lignify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: The magic puppeteer lignified the boy and called him Pinocchio.
